question: Who has won the 2017 men singles title at the Bulgarian International Future Series Badminton tournament?
explanation: Commonwealth Games bronze medallist RMV Gurusaidutt has clinched the men\'s singles title at the Bulgarian International Future Series Badminton tournament on October 9, 2017. Gurusaidutt, who has been out of action since the US Open in July 2016 due to an injury, defeated Muhammed Ali Kurt in the final by 21- 17, 21-16.
